name: About GoGroup
description: GoGroup is an operational holding company focused on building its own businesses and partnering with others to create outstanding digital products. Founded in 2019 by serial entrepreneurs from Fab.com.

itemOffered.name: Third-Party Partnership
itemOffered.description: Teaming up with third-parties to scale their digital businesses

itemOffered.name: Smart Money Investment
itemOffered.description: Investing smart money in startups supporting theses around the New Industry

owns.name: Tech Powerhouse
owns.description: A tech powerhouse that grew a global unicorn and built for scale It supports rapid growth through long-term team ownership, deep business alignment, and stability across project lifecycles. Designed to go beyond conventional agency models, it integrates tech teams into partner organizations to ensure fluent, scalable delivery from idea through maturity

additionalProperty.name: Philosophy
additionalProperty.value: Imperturbable believe in entrepreneurs who build for the long term

additionalProperty.name: Heritage
additionalProperty.value: Founded by entrepreneurs from Fab.com unicorn

mainContentOfPage.description: Information about GoGroup's founding, mission, global presence, and three core business activities: creating own businesses, partnering with third-parties, and smart money investment.
